topics.body:
I just realized something funny; you know how your parents and your grandparents go "When I was a kid everything was better", but immediately glosses over everything wrong with the era they grew up in?

Chances are most people here will do the same thing when they have kids and claim that this current era was the greatest in history.

[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a385dc6368724e122e0200#post_53a385dc6368724e122e0200
So uc. Honey. Who do you ship in touhou?[/bq]
!http://www.pleated-jeans.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/when-someone-asks-what-you-want-for-your-birthday.gif!
Yukari x Ran
Marisa x Alice x Patchoulli
Keine x Mokou
Mokou x Kaguya
Aya x Reimu
Koishi x Hata no kokoro
Sanae x Reimu
Yuuka x Tenshi
Tenshi x Iku
Youma x Yuyuko
Rin x Utsuho
Momiji x Aya
Sakuya x Meiling
Byakuren x Miko
. . .
five minutes later
. . .
Wakasagahime x Kagerou
Cirno x Daiyousei
. . .
So much later the previous narrator quit his job and started his family
. . .
Reisen x Eirin
. . .
Heat death of the universe
. . .
Shanghai x Hourai dolls
And that is the end of the list; any questions?
